coverage_details.organ_transplant: All types of organs transplant covered, including fresh, synthetic, Bone marrow and cochlea transplant
coverage_details.dental_general: SR 5,000.00 (Deductible: Nil; No classification applied to dental limits for all classes; Dental limits may include preventive, basic, and major care as per policy)
coverage_details.optical: SR 750.00. Optical is covered for all ages. Frame limit up to optical annual limit.
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No Preauthorization Required. No pre-approval required for outpatient or inpatient services. Follows the Standard Pre-authorisation Protocol.
coverage_details.special_instructions: No classification applied to dental limits for all classes; Cover Non-life threatening congenital conditions; Cover 2 Health Lounges and 2 Live Right Programs; Medication deductibles: Generic 0%, Branded 20% up to SAR 200; Interstitial glucose monitor device and sensors are covered subject to RM approval; Reimbursement claims for new and missing documents up to 180 days; Artificial Limbs, Prostheses, and Medical Equipment are covered.
